sect2.title: TextMessageValidator
sect2.para: The text validator treats each rule line as a regular expression and checks if the response message matches that regular expression. The response message must match all lines in order to be successfully validated.

simplesect.title: Example of TextMessageValidator configuration
simplesect.programlisting: ... <validator id="rimmerIsAFishValidator" class="TextMessageValidator"><![CDATA[ .*"I'm a [Ff]ish", Rimmer Arnold J\.* ]]></validator> ...
